title: Looking for a T210 Benny, Charleston...
author: seablaster

posts.post_title: Looking for a T210 Benny, Charleston...
posts.post_content:
I've had some fairly good success on the board lately trading/buying/selling so I figured I'd give the dice another roll.

I'd pay a fairly stupid price for a low grade Benny and a confirmed stupid price for a nicer one.  Stupid price also paid for the 1910 Charleston team PC, cough, Scott.  :)

Please PM me if you have one.  Thank you.
